attributes.action: unmarried fathers to have equal rights of there children
attributes.additional_details: A lot of mums stop fathers from seeing there children when they get into a new relationship and it’s not right that the mum should have all rights over them children/child , it should be made qual for both mother and father to still have regular contact, unless there is a court order in place to say it’s unsafe then they should still be allowed that contact .
attributes.background: To help unmarried fathers have equal rights of there children/child as the mother, so that they can see and have contact with there children without the mother saying they carnt see them .
